name: Frostbite (itch) (OuterCloudStudio)
description:
USE WINDOWS OR MAC BUILD FOR BEST PERFORMANCE!!!

This game was made for the Great Winter Game Jam. WAD / Arrow keys to move. Space to jump. Left click to mine (May take multiple clicks). Right click to build. Scroll to change selection and crafting selection. E to open and close crafting. Survive by crafting a fire. Enjoy the custom physics!
